description: Detects Rclone config file being created
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: RDP File Creation From Suspicious Application
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\brave.exe" OR "*\\CCleaner\ Browser\\Application\\CCleanerBrowser.exe" OR "*\\chromium.exe" OR "*\\firefox.exe" OR "*\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe" OR "*\\iexplore.exe" OR "*\\microsoftedge.exe" OR "*\\msedge.exe" OR "*\\Opera.exe" OR "*\\Vivaldi.exe" OR "*\\Whale.exe" OR "*\\Outlook.exe" OR "*\\RuntimeBroker.exe" OR "*\\Thunderbird.exe" OR "*\\Discord.exe" OR "*\\Keybase.exe" OR "*\\msteams.exe" OR "*\\Slack.exe" OR "*\\teams.exe") AND file.path.text:"*.rdp*")
